pkgmetadata.longdescription: Open Scoring API Client // Creativity research involves the need to score open-ended problems. Usually done by humans, automatic scoring using AI becomes more and more accurate. This package provides a simple interface to the 'Open Scoring' API https://openscoring.du.edu/docs, leading creativity scoring technology by Organiscak et al. (2023) doi:10.1016/j.tsc.2023.101356. With it, you can score your own data directly from an R script.
